CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Select Carrier or Service stage positioned above or below the Begin Transportation stage?
SRP.A: The Select Carrier or Service stage is positioned {above} the Begin Transportation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Select Carrier or Service?
VE.A: The value of stage Select Carrier or Service is {3954}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete Delivery?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete Delivery is {628}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Book Transport Service?
VE.A: The value of stage Book Transport Service is {2251}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Select Carrier or Service, with a value of {3954}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Complete Delivery, with a value of {628}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Begin Transportation to stage Complete Delivery?
SC.A: Decreased by {147} Thousand Shipments from stage Begin Transportation to stage Complete Delivery.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Select Carrier or Service to stage Book Transport Service?
SC.A: Decreased by {1703} Thousand Shipments from stage Select Carrier or Service to stage Book Transport Service.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1014? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Select Carrier or Service} stage has {3954}, the {Book Transport Service} stage has {2251}, the {Prepare for Pickup} stage has {1254}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1014? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Begin Transportation} stage has {775}, the {Complete Delivery} stage has {628}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 701 and 3102? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Book Transport Service} stage has {2251}, the {Prepare for Pickup} stage has {1254}, the {Begin Transportation} stage has {775}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup, or from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Transport Service} to {Prepare for Pickup} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery, or from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Transport Service} to {Prepare for Pickup} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup, from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery, or from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Transport Service} to stage {Prepare for Pickup} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Select Carrier or Service} and {Book Transport Service} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Begin Transportation} and {Complete Delivery} stages.
